entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Filament Tapes
Price: 3.83

[shortdesc]

Tartan(TM) Filament Tape 8934 Clear, 36 mm x 55 m

  • 3M™ Filament Tape 8934 is constructed on a clear polypropylene backing, reinforced with glass yarn filaments, for strapping, bundling and reinforcing applications
  • It has a tensile strength of 100 pounds per inch (18 kg per cm) width and a pressure-sensitive synthetic rubber adhesive offers good shear strength to fibreboard, plastics and most metals surfaces.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Length 55m

  • Tensile strength of 100 pounds per inch (18 kg per cm) width

entry.title: 3M Tartan 8932-24X55 - Tartan Filament Tape 8932 Clear 0.95 Inch x 60 Yards (2.4cm x 55m) 7000124818
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Filament Tapes
Price: 1.87

[shortdesc]

3M Tartan Filament Tape, 8932, clear, 0.95 in x 60 yd (2.4 cm x 55 m)

  • 3M™ Filament Tape 8932 is constructed on a clear polypropylene backing, reinforced with glass yarn filaments for light duty bundling, reinforcing and pallet unitizing applications where nick and abrasion resistance is needed.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Line Tartan
    Adhesive Type Rubber
    Application General Facility Maintenance
    Backing Material Polypropylene Film
    Color Clear
    Elongation 3 Percent
    Industry Food and Beverage, General Industrial
    Length 60yds
    Width 0.95 Inch
    Origin Country Canada
    Product Type Filament Tapes
    Tensile Strength 95 lb/in

    Product Information

  • General purpose, light duty filament reinforced strapping tape
  • Abrasion and moisture resistant
  • Good shear strength to fibreboard, plastics and most metal surfaces for bundling, strapping and reinforcing applications
  • Allows printing and illustrations to be seen through the tape
  • Holds with minimum rub-down

    • Suggested Application

  • Ideal for light-duty bundling, reinforcing and pallet unitizing applications where nick and abrasion resistance are needed
  • General purpose applications
